Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: TUF GAMING B760M-PLUS WIFI D4
Part Number: 90MB1DG0-M0AAY0


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Celeron / Intel Core 12th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 13th Gen (LGA 1700) / Pentium Gold


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel B760


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR4)
Memory Standard: DDR4 3200
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel
Memory Feature: DDR4 5333(OC) / 5066(OC) / 5000(OC) / 4800(OC) / 4600(OC) / 4400(OC) / 4266(OC) / 4000(OC) / 3733(OC) / 3600(OC) / 3466(OC) / 3400(OC) / 3333(OC) / 3200 / 3000 / 2933 / 2800 / 2666 / 2400 / 2133


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: Intel 13th & 12th Gen Processors 
1 x PCIe 5.0 x16 slot
PCI Express 4.0 x16: Intel B760 Chipset 
1 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slot (supports x4 mode) 
1 x PCIe 4.0 x1 slot


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: Intel 13th & 12th Gen Processors 
M.2_1 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode) 
Intel B760 Chipset 
M.2_2 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)
SATA RAID: Intel Rapid Storage Technology supports SATA RAID 0/1/5/10.


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio CODEC
- Supports: Jack-detection, Multi-streaming, Front Panel Jack-retasking
- Supports up to 24-Bit/192 kHz playback 
Audio Features 
- Audio Shielding 
- Rear optical S/PDIF out port 
- Premium audio capacitors 
- Dedicated audio PCB layers
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
Max LAN Speed: 1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet 
TUF LANGuard
Wireless LAN: Wi-Fi 6
2x2 Wi-Fi 6 (802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax) 
Supports 2.4/5GHz frequency band
Bluetooth: Bluetooth v5.2*
*The Bluetooth version may vary, please refer to the Wi-Fi module manufacturer's website for the latest specifications.


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 port (1 x USB Type-C) 
4 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports (4 x Type-A) 
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 port (1 x Type-A) 
2 x USB 2.0 ports (2 x Type-A) 
1 x DisplayPort 
1 x HDMI port 
1 x Wi-Fi Module 
1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet port 
5 x Audio jacks 
1 x Optical S/PDIF out port


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 connector (supports USB Type-C) 
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 header supports additional 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports 
2 x USB 2.0 headers support additional 4 USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan and Cooling related 
1 x 4-pin CPU Fan header 
1 x 4-pin CPU OPT Fan header 
1 x 4-pin AIO Pump header 
3 x 4-pin Chassis Fan headers 
 
Storage related 
2 x M.2 slots (Key M) 
4 x SATA 6Gb/s ports 
 
Miscellaneous 
3 x Addressable Gen 2 headers 
1 x AURA RGB header 
1 x Clear CMOS header 
1 x Front Panel Audio header (AAFP) 
1 x 20-3 pin System Panel header with Chassis intrude function 
1 x Thunderbolt (USB4) header


Physical Spec
Form Factor: Micro ATX
Dimensions (W x L): 9.6" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin Main Power connector 
1 x 8-pin +12V Power connector 
1 x 4-pin +12V Power connector


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported


Features
Features: ASUS TUF PROTECTION 
- DIGI+ VRM (- Digital power design with DrMOS) 
- ESD Guards 
- TUF LANGuard 
- Overvoltage Protection 
- SafeSlot Core+ 
- Stainless-Steel Back I/O 
ASUS Q-Design 
- M.2 Q-Latch 
- Q-DIMM 
- Q-LED (CPU [red], DRAM [yellow], VGA [white], Boot Device [yellow green]) 
- Q-Slot 
ASUS Thermal Solution 
- M.2 heatsink 
- VRM heatsink design 
ASUS EZ DIY 
- CPU Socket lever protector 
- ProCool 
- Pre-mounted I/O shield 
- SafeDIMM 
AURA Sync 
- AURA RGB header 
- Addressable Gen 2 headers


Packaging
Package Contents: Cables 
2 x SATA 6Gb/s cables 

Miscellaneous 
1 x ASUS Wi-Fi moving antennas 
1 x M.2 Rubber Package 
1 x Screw package for M.2 SSD 
1 x TUF Gaming sticker 

Documentation
